desc: Adroid Application Testing Guide is a highly detailed book which gives step-by-step examples for a great variety of real-world cases, providing professional guidelines and recommendations that will be extremely valuable for optimizing your development time and resources. In the chapters you will find an introduction to specific testing techniques, and tools for specific situations. If you are an Android developer looking to test your applications or optimize your application development process, then this book is for you. No previous experience in application testing is required.
title: Android Application Testing Guide
